images.caption: Figure 1.The SQuTR benchmark pipeline overview. (a-c) Construction of high-fidelity spoken queries from six IR benchmarks using rigorous quality control. (d) Simulation of four acoustic conditions under diverse environmental noise. (e-f) Dataset statistics and the unified evaluation framework for both cascaded and end-to-end retrieval systems.
Figure 2.Distribution of noise categories in the SQuTR.

Figure 3.Accuracy vs. Stability Trade-off.The scatter plot positions systems based on Mean NDCG@10 (Y-axis) and Standard Deviation (X-axis). Models enclosed indashed linesare evaluated on English datasets only.

header: Appendix AMathematical Formulation of Acoustic Simulation
